name: Remy Russell
seeking: Currently seeking remote or hybrid roles in the Salt Lake City area.
summary: An optimistic and technical product leader with three years of Product Management and seven years of Business Analysis experience evolving SaaS platforms for Health and Human Services Providers

professionalExperience.description: Product Lead on the Platform and Integrations R&D team/pod for a configurable Case Management platform used by over 160 customers (Homeless Management, Medically Tailored Meals, Behavioral Health)
highlights: Enabled 50% growth in ARR to ~$15M by expanding our platform and team capabilities, leading to acquisition
Released frequent enhancements based on business priorities and insights (SSO & 2-Step Verification, scheduled CSV exports, no-code integration design tools, new API endpoints and security features)
Shipped a RESTful API from 0 to 1 and onboarded developers for over ten customer organizations
Partnered with Engineering, Leadership, Sales, and others to maintain the roadmap, define KPIs, communicate progress, and align on priorities

Delivered and scrapped POCs/MVPs for new growth initiatives and integrations (SMS/email notifications via Twilio, last-mile delivery tools via Onfleet, Health Information Exchange and Revenue Cycle Management use cases

professionalExperience.description: Problem discovery, requirements gathering, and solution delivery leveraging the case management platform.
highlights: Drove successful implementation for two of Eccovia's top ten largest customers by ARR, with complex data migrations and system designs
Delivered over a dozen integration contracts and helped transition technical strategy towards agnostic services supporting multiple customers/partners

professionalExperience.position: Business Analyst II, UT MMIS Implementation Project
professionalExperience.description: System migration and gap analysis activities for implementation of a Medicaid Management Information System for the Utah Department of Health
highlights: Collaborated with customer and internal teams to iterate detailed system design documents and guide development/testing of the Provider Enrollment Subsystem

professionalExperience.position: Business Analyst, MI MMIS Implementation Project
professionalExperience.description: Analyzed program mandates published by CMS and iterated the 'Electronic Medicaid Incentive Payment Program' solution used by providers to report 'Meaningful Use' of EHRs

coreSkills: Problem/solution discovery, learning from users/buyers, and owning complex challenges
Stakeholder communication and ability to articulate technical details or high-level strategy
Facilitating cross-functional collaboration and rapid, iterative delivery of value
Partnering with engineers (SQL proficient, basic understanding of SDLC, experience prompting LLMs)
toolsAndFrameworks: Agile, Scrum (Jira for roadmapping, backlog refinement, Kanban, sprint ceremonies, dashboards)
Mock-ups and low-fi prototyping (Figma, AI Tools)
GTM and release communication (Jira, Azure Pipelines)
No or low-code API Testing and workflow automation (Zapier, Microsoft Power Automate, Postman)
